name: Rainbow Flame
description:
The country of flame was felled in endless darkness. You are the chosen one who must collect flames to get enough light to light up the country again. You will disguise and try to survive in the country of flame.

If you touch a flame that has the same color as yours, you will collect it; but if you touch a flame that has different color as yours, you will be damaged.

You can use WASD to move around, and use CVBNM to change your color.
